Title: Active power
Description: The product of voltage and the in-phase component of alternating current measured in units of watts and standard multiples thereof.

Title: Reactive power
Description: The product of voltage and current and the sine of the phase angle between them, measured in units of voltamperes reactive and standard multiples thereof. (not used for planned schedules).

Title: Active energy
Description: The electrical energy produced, flowing or supplied by an electrical circuit during a time interval, being the integral with respect to time of instantaneous active power, measured in units of watt-hours, or standard multiples thereof.

Title: Reactive energy
Description: The integral with respect to time of reactive power (not used for planned schedules).

Title: Water
Description: For hydro power stations, this enables the identification of the quantity of water stored behind a dam (volume, head level, etc.), or the constraints in the flow of water.
